Version 1.28.Documentation: Check out the release notes at: https://docs.streamlit.io/library/changelog#version-1320

TestingFramework.Description: Introducing a new testing framework for Streamlit apps!
TestingFramework.Documentation: Check out our documentation to learn how to build automated tests for your apps at: https://docs.streamlit.io/library/api-reference/app-testing

ConnectionManagement.Description: Announcing the general availability of st.connection, a command to conveniently manage connections in Streamlit apps.
ConnectionManagement.Documentation: Check out the docs to learn more at: https://docs.streamlit.io/library/api-reference/connections#built-in-connections.

SnowflakeConnection.Description: SnowparkConnection has been upgraded to the new and improved SnowflakeConnection — the same, great functionality plus more!
SnowflakeConnection.Documentation: Check out our built-in connections at: https://docs.streamlit.io/library/api-reference/connections/st.connections.snowflakeconnection

DataEditorUI.Description: st.dataframe and st.data_editor have a new toolbar!
DataEditorUI.Documentation: Users can search and download data in addition to enjoying improved UI for row additions and deletions. See our updated guide on Dataframes at: https://docs.streamlit.io/library/advanced-features/dataframes.

SpinnerOverlay.Description: When using a spinner with cached functions, the spinner will be overlaid instead of pushing content down.

DatetimeEditing.Description: st.data_editor now supports datetime index editing.

DecimalSupport.Description: Improved support for decimal.Decimal in st.dataframe and st.data_editor.

GlobalHashlibKwargs.Description: Global kwargs were added for hashlib.

ClipboardWriting.Description: st.components.v1.iframe now permits writing to clipboard.

SafeSessionState.Description: SafeSessionState disconnect was replaced with script runner yield points for improved efficiency and clarity.

LangchainCallbackHandler.Description: The Langchain callback handler will show the full input string inside the body of a st.status when the input string is too long to show as a label.

GraphvizChartLayout.Description: st.graphviz_chart now supports using different Graphviz layout engines.

DataFrameSerialization.Description: Legacy serialization for DataFrames was removed. All DataFrames will be serialized by Apache Arrow.

PostParentMessage.Description: Added post_parent_message platform command to send custom messages from a Streamlit app to its parent window.

StringDtypeHandling.Description: Improved string dtype handling for DataFrames.

SafeHTMLWrite.Description: st.write will avoid using unsafe_allow_html=True if possible.

ExpanderFix.Description: Bug fix: Implementation of st.expander was simplified for improved behavior and consistency.

MultipageLinkFix.Description: Bug fix: Multipage links in the sidebar are now aligned with other sidebar elements.

ChatInputFix.Description: Bug fix: st.chat_input won't incorrectly prompt for label parameter in IDEs.

ScrollbarFix.Description: Bug fix: Scroll bars correctly overlay st.dataframe and st.data_editor without adding empty space.

ChatMessageFix.Description: Bug fix: st.chat_message behaves correctly with the removal of AutoSizer.

AnchorLinkFix.Description: Bug fix: Anchor links are reliably produced for non-English headers.

SnowparkConnectionFix.Description: Bug fix: st.connections.SnowparkConnection more accurately detects when it’s running within Streamlit in Snowflake.

PandasStylerWarningFix.Description: Bug fix: A user-friendly warning is shown when exceeding the size limitations of a pandas Styler object.

DataEditorColumnNameFix.Description: Bug fix: st.data_editor automatically converts non-string column names to strings.

DataEditorIndexFix.Description: Bug fix: st.data_editor correctly identifies non-range indices as a required column.

FileUploaderFix.Description: Bug fix: st.file_uploader displays compound file extensions like csv.gz correctly.

ColumnConfigurationFix.Description: Bug fix: Column Configuration no longer uses deprecated type checks.

ToolbarItemFix.Description: Bug fix: Additional toolbar items no longer stack vertically.

ColumnConfigurationMypyFix.Description: Bug fix: Column Configuration no longer causes a type warning in Mypy.

BokehSliderFix.Description: Bug fix: Bokeh Sliders no longer cause JavaScript errors.

CachingFix.Description: Bug fix: Caching now recognizes DataFrames with the same values but different column names as different.
